name: Splat! (itch) (vimino)
description:
I made a prototype in 2016 (used a fixed 800x600 size) and finally updated it to both resize and actually have "Splat!" happen on Game Over.

Collecting Points (Yellow Circles) increases the Players speed slightly.
Touching the Goal (Big Yellow Circle) completes the level.

Controls:
- Mouse/Touch marks where the fragile Player (Green Square) will move
- On "Next Level" and "Game Over" screens a click/touch continues or restarts

Warning: This game is impossibly hard at high levels since the Enemies (Red Squares) follow along, never being too far off.
